name: Three Sisters' Marketplace
tag_list: ecommerce, shopping, art, crafts, retail, online
overview:
Three Sisters’ Marketplace (www.ThreeSistersMarketplace.com) is filling an unmet need of supporting artisans while also giving shoppers what they are looking for - quality hand-crafted products. All of this while connecting everyone in a fun, online environment - a social e-commerce. We’re all about finding the win-win scenario - which is very different from most other sites out there that look to make money without ensuring that all of their users are also successful.

What’s been very exciting is that the connections that are being made through shopping and purchases are growing beyond the standard transaction into more personal interactions. This is exactly what we are about - connecting people - in terms of building a community of artisans, people that appreciate quality hand-made items and people that want to interact to build ongoing business relationships. It’s this piece that will keep shoppers coming back and artisans will also be attracted to this because it means repeat business from known customers and an ever-expanding network.

After years as a successful executive in sales and marketing in the pharmaceutical industry, Wendy decided to combine her business experience and her passion for art to build a web-based business www.ThreeSistersMarketplace.com.

Wendyâ€™s inspiration came from the people closest to her - artisans in her family, her friends and neighbors who created beautiful pottery, hand-knit sweaters, and fine jewelry as well as unique sculptures and paintings. Artisans found it was a challenge to justify the expenses of maintaining art galleries and art stores or carting delicate items to and from art exhibits and craft shows.

Wendy thought it would be easier to create a platform online to showcase items and create an art community exchange.
